From the Sapporo central station, take the Japan Railways train to

, change trains to the Kutchan line, and exit the train at the
Yoichi stop.

The Nikka distillery produces whiskey in the traditional
manner, and offers free tours. The distillery is within sight of the main exit from the station, about a three minute walk away.
Guided tours are in Japanese.  English
speakers can tour the distillery with the help of one of the pamphlets
printed in English and distributed at the entrance. The distillery makes
single malt and blended whiskies. It offers generous free samples and cask-strength samples for
a small fee. The store on the distillery's campus sells the locally produced whiskey.

Try the sea urchin flavored ice cream at the convenience store
attached to the station.
